items.name: jsx-renderer
items.title: JSX Renderer
items.description: A component that renders JSX strings with access to tailwind, shadcn components and lucide icons.

items.name: chat-input
items.title: Chat Input
items.description: A chat input component with mention support and automatic height adjustment.

items.name: chat-message-area
items.title: Chat Message Area
items.description: A component that adds auto scrolling functionality to a list of messages.

items.name: chat-message
items.title: Chat Message
items.description: A fully composable component for displaying chat messages with rich features like timestamps, actions, and threading.

items.name: chat-suggestions
items.title: Chat Suggestions
items.description: A composable component for displaying chat prompt suggestions as clickable buttons.

items.name: markdown-content
items.title: Markdown Content
items.description: A component that renders markdown content.

items.name: tool-invocation
items.title: Tool Invocation
items.description: A component that displays a tool invocation with a collapsible content.

items.name: model-selector
items.title: Model Selector
items.description: A dropdown component for selecting AI models with provider icons.

items.name: resizable-node
items.title: Resizable Node
items.description: A wrapper React Flow node component that adds resizing functionality to other nodes.

items.name: node-header-status
items.title: Node Header Status
items.description: A React Flow component that displays status indicators in node headers.

items.name: editable-handle
items.title: Editable Handle
items.description: A React Flow component that allows you to dynamically add, edit, or remove input/output handles on your nodes.

items.name: status-edge
items.title: Status Edge
items.description: A React Flow edge component that provides visual feedback through color-coded states.

items.name: generate-text-node
items.title: Generate Text Node
items.description: A React Flow node component that represents Vercel AI SDK's text generation capabilities, featuring system instructions, prompts, and optional tool outputs.

items.name: prompt-crafter-node
items.title: Prompt Crafter Node
items.description: A React Flow node component for building dynamic prompts by combining multiple inputs using a template-based approach.

items.name: text-input-node
items.title: Text Input Node
items.description: A React Flow node component that provides a simple text input interface with a resizable textarea and single output.

items.name: visualize-text-node
items.title: Visualize Text Node
items.description: A React Flow node component for displaying text content with Markdown support and a resizable interface.

items.name: json-schema-editor
items.title: JSON Schema Editor
items.description: A visual editor for creating and editing JSON Schema definitions with support for nested objects, arrays, enums, and property descriptions.

items.name: reasoning
items.title: Reasoning
items.description: A component for displaying AI reasoning content with collapsible sections and streaming support.

items.name: jsx-utils
items.description: A set of utilities for working with JSX.

items.name: id-to-readable-text
items.description: A utility for converting an ID to a readable text.

items.name: chat-01
items.description: A simple chat page.
items.docs:
Get an OpenAI API key from https://platform.openai.com/ and add it to the environment variables file and run the dev server. 

Learn more about how to use the Vercel AI SDK https://ai-sdk.dev/docs/introduction.

items.name: flow-chain
items.description: Agentic chain workflow.
items.docs:
Get API keys from OpenAI (https://platform.openai.com/), Groq (https://console.groq.com/), and DeepSeek (https://platform.deepseek.com/) and add them to the environment variables file and run the dev server. 

Learn more about how to use the Vercel AI SDK https://ai-sdk.dev/docs/introduction.
